name: Jeanne Kate
textInChatBox: You're the missing piece I never knew I needed.. blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: The way you smile makes me feel whole.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you love it.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
